duties_responsibilities.duty: Revenue generation of an entire territory
Encourage and develop relationships and generate opportunities with partners (Microsoft, Salesforce)
Drive opportunities from Lead Gen/Intro Call/Discovery/Demo/Value proposition to Proposal/Negotiation/Legal/Closing
Understand customer needs, budget, decision-makers, timeline, and challenges
Bring sales expertise to continuously improve the sales processes and adapt to existing best practices
Understand the local market and identify new areas of opportunities
Support the lead generation effort with emails, calls, social outreach

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
